synopsis.text: And so begins the enchanting journey of Yume Kikuchi, a budding magician who leaves the comfort of her home in Iwate prefecture to pursue her dreams in the bustling city of Tokyo. In this contemporary world where magic and technology coexist, magic has become a respected profession, utilized to accomplish tasks beyond the capabilities of technology. Yume, the daughter of a renowned magician, finds herself under the mentorship of the captivating and accomplished magician Masami Oyamada, who also owns a nightclub. As she embarks on her magical training in an unfamiliar city, Yume learns the true essence of magic, its impact on people's lives, and the realization that magic alone may not be the key to genuine happiness. Under the watchful eye of her charming mentor, Yume's magical journey unfolds, filled with anticipation, challenges, and life lessons that will shape her into the magician she aspires to be.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
